alert.note: Alert for Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 11:42AM EST until December 20 at 7:45AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wappingers Creek at Wappingers Falls. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:31 AM EST Monday the stage was 6.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 10.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Wappingers Creek Wappingers Falls Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Mon 11 am: 6.6 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 7.3 Mon 7 pm 9.7 Tue 1 am 10.7 Tue 7 am 10.6 Tue 1 pm 10.0 Tue 7 pm 9.1 Wed 1 am 8.1 Wed 7 am 7.3 Wed 1 pm 6.6 Wed 7 pm 6.1 Thu 1 am 5.8 Thu 7 am 5.6 &&
